Subcommittee on Government Operations and Metropolitan Affairs

official_title: To extend to the Mayor of the District of Columbia the same authority with respect to the National Guard of the District of Columbia as the Governor of a State exercises with respect to the National Guard of that State.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia code to make the Mayor of the District of Columbia the Commander-in-Chief of the militia of the District (National Guard) with jurisdiction over: (1) the reserve corps; (2) the appointment of commissioned officers; (3) the call for duty; and (4) general courts-martial.

titles.title: To extend to the Mayor of the District of Columbia the same authority with respect to the National Guard of the District of Columbia as the Governor of a State exercises with respect to the National Guard of that State.
